description.english: Pass the test of the Hall of Tribulations to become a Shaper
description.german: Bestehe den Test in der Halle der Prüfungen, um ein Former zu werden.
description.french: Passer le test au Hall des Épreuves pour devenir un Animancien
description.italian: Supera la prova della Sala dei Tormenti per diventare un Animante
description.spanish: Pasa la prueba en el Salón de las Tribulaciones para convertirte en transmutador
description.schinese: 通过苦难大厅的试炼并成为一名塑魂者
description.russian: Пройти испытание в Зале Невзгод и стать творцом

description.english: Ana is sundered by Zahr
description.french: Ana a été mor-scellée par Zahr
description.italian: Ana viene laceranimata da Zahr
description.spanish: Zahr fragmentó a Ana
description.schinese: 艾娜中了扎尔的碎裂法术

description.english: Find Ana's Heart
description.french: Récupérer le Cœur d'Ana
description.italian: Trova il cuore di Ana
description.spanish: Encuentra el Corazón de Ana
description.schinese: 找到艾娜的内心

description.english: Find Ana's Mind
description.french: Récupérer l'Esprit d'Ana
description.italian: Trova la mente di Ana
description.spanish: Encuentra la Mente de Ana
description.schinese: 找到艾娜的头脑

description.english: Find Ana's Body
description.french: Récupérer le Corps d'Ana
description.italian: Trova il corpo di Ana
description.spanish: Encuentra el Cuerpo de Ana
description.schinese: 找到艾娜的躯体

displayName.english: Heart, Mind and Body bound by the Spark
displayName.german: Herz, Verstand und Körper - verbunden durch den Funken
displayName.french: Cœur, Esprit et Corps liés par le Spark
displayName.italian: Cuore, Mente e Corpo connessi tramite lo Spark
displayName.spanish: Corazón, Mente y Cuerpo vinculados por la Chispa
displayName.schinese: 由火种相连的内心、头脑的躯体
displayName.russian: Искра соединяет Сердце, Разум и Тело

description.english: Find Ana's Spark and bring her back to life
description.german: Finde Anas Funken und erwecke sie wieder zum Leben.
description.french: Récupérer le Spark d'Ana et lui redonner vie
description.italian: Trova lo Spark di Ana e riportala in vita
description.spanish: Encuentra la Chispa de Ana y tráela de regreso a la vida
description.schinese: 找到艾娜的火种并将她复活
description.russian: Найти Искру Аны и вернуть ее к жизни

description.english: Otto has attained Shaper Level 5
description.french: Otto a atteint le niveau 5
description.italian: Otto ha raggiunto il livello Animante 5
description.spanish: Otto alcanzó el nivel 5 de invocador
description.schinese: 奥托已升至塑魂者等级5

description.english: Otto has attained Shaper Level 10
description.french: Otto a atteint le niveau 10
description.italian: Otto ha raggiunto il livello Animante 10
description.spanish: Otto alcanzó el nivel 10 de invocador
description.schinese: 奥托已升至塑魂者等级10

description.english: Otto has attained Shaper Level 20
description.french: Otto a atteint le niveau 20
description.italian: Otto ha raggiunto il livello Animante 20
description.spanish: Otto alcanzó el nivel 20 de invocador
description.schinese: 奥托已升至塑魂者等级20

description.english: Otto has attained Shaper Level 30
description.french: Otto a atteint le niveau 30
description.italian: Otto ha raggiunto il livello Animante 30
description.spanish: Otto alcanzó el nivel 30 de invocador
description.schinese: 奥托升到了塑魂者等级30

description.english: Master the Art of Shaping Sentinels
description.french: Maîtriser l'Art d'animer des Sentinelles
description.italian: Padroneggia l'arte di animare le Sentinelle
description.spanish: Domina el arte de transmutar Centinelas
description.schinese: 掌握塑造哨卫的技艺

description.english: Master the Art of Shaping Keepers
description.french: Maîtriser l'Art d'animer des Catalystes
description.italian: Padroneggia l'arte di animare i Catalimanti
description.spanish: Domina el arte de transmutar Catalizadores
description.schinese: 掌握塑造夺能者的技艺

description.english: Master the Art of Shaping Commanders
description.french: Maîtriser l'Art d'animer des Commandants
description.italian: Padroneggia l'arte di animare i Comandanti
description.spanish: Domina el arte de transmutar Comandantes
description.schinese: 掌握塑造指挥官的技艺

description.english: Master the Art of Shaping Summoners
description.french: Maîtriser l'Art d'animer des Invocateurs
description.italian: Padroneggia l'arte di animare gli Invocatori
description.spanish: Domina el arte de transmutar Invocadores
description.schinese: 掌握塑造召唤者的技艺

description.english: Obtain a global S ranking on any level
description.french: Obtenir un Rang S à la fin de n'importe quel niveau
description.italian: Ottieni un piazzamento globale S a qualunque livello
description.spanish: Obtén una clasificación global S en cualquier nivel
description.schinese: 在任意关卡获得S级全局评价
description.russian: Получить ранг S на любом уровне

description.english: Complete all levels with a global rank of A or higher
description.french: Terminer tous les niveaux avec au moins un Rang A dans chaque
description.italian: Completa tutti i livelli con un piazzamento globale A o superiore
description.spanish: Completa todos los niveles con una clasificación global A o mayor
description.schinese: 以至少A级全局评价完成所有关卡
description.russian: Пройти все уровни с рангом «А» или выше

description.english: Collect the complete set of Anima Tablets
description.french: Récupérer toutes les Tablettes d'Anima
description.italian: Raccogli il set completo di Tavolette Animus
description.spanish: Junta el juego completo de Tablillas de Anima
description.schinese: 集齐所有灵能石板

description.english: Collect all Crystal Fragments
description.french: Récupérer tous les fragments de Cristal de Vie
description.italian: Raccogli tutti i frammenti di cristallo
description.spanish: Junta todos los fragmentos de cristal
description.schinese: 集齐所有水晶碎片

description.english: Collect the complete set of Anima Runes
description.french: Récupérer toutes les Runes de pouvoir
description.italian: Raccogli il set completo di Rune Animus
description.spanish: Junta el juego completo de Runas de Anima
description.schinese: 集齐所有灵能符文

description.english: Complete all optional Quests
description.french: Terminer toutes les quêtes optionnelles
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni facoltative
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones opcionales
description.schinese: 完成所有可选任务

description.english: Stun 20 enemies using Protector Battlecry
description.french: Assomer 20 ennemis en utilisant le Cri de Guerre des Protecteurs
description.italian: Stordisci 20 nemici con il Grido di battaglia del Protettore
description.spanish: Aturde a 20 enemigos con el Grito de guerra de los Protectores
description.schinese: 用保卫者战斗怒吼击晕20个敌人

description.english: Eliminate 20 enemies using Sentinel Battlecry
description.french: Détruire 20 ennemis en utilisant le Cri de Guerre des Sentinelles
description.italian: Elimina 20 nemici con il Grido di battaglia della Sentinella
description.spanish: Elimina a 20 enemigos con el Grito de guerra de los Centinelas
description.schinese: 用哨卫战斗怒吼消灭20个敌人

description.english: Collect 100 Flames of Anima in a single fight using Keepers
description.german: Sammle in einem einzigen Kampf mithilfe von Hütern 100 Animaflammen.
description.french: Récupérer 100 Flammes d'Anima générées par les Catalystes en un seul combat
description.italian: Raccogli 100 fiamme di Animus in un'unica battaglia usando i Catalimanti
description.spanish: Junta 100 Llamas de Anima en una sola pelea usando Catalizadores
description.schinese: 一场战斗中，用夺能者收集100个灵能之焰
description.russian: С помощью Хранителей собрать 100 сгустков Анимы за один бой

description.english: Trigger the Battlecry of at least 30 Guardians simultaneously
description.german: Aktiviere den Schlachtruf für mindestens 30 Wächter gleichzeitig.
description.french: Activer le Cri de Guerre d'au moins 30 Gardiens en même temps
description.italian: Attiva il Grido di battaglia di almeno 30 Guardiani simultaneamente
description.spanish: Activa el Grito de guerra de mínimo 30 guardianes simultáneamente
description.schinese: 同时触发至少30个守护者的战斗怒吼
description.russian: Одновременно активировать «Боевой клич» как минимум 30 стражей

description.english: Use Summoners to generate 100 Moppets in a single fight
description.german: Setze Beschwörer ein, um in einem einzigen Kampf 100 Diener zu erschaffen.
description.french: Générer 100 Pantins par des Invocateurs en un seul combat
description.italian: Usa gli Invocatori per generare 100 Galoppini in un'unica battaglia
description.spanish: Utiliza Invocadores para generar 100 Subguardianes en una sola pelea
description.schinese: 一场战斗中，使用召唤者创造100个傀儡
description.russian: Использовать Призывателей, чтобы создать 100 истуканов за один бой

displayName.english: Get me to the Church on Time!
displayName.french: Juste à temps pour le mariage !

description.english: Finish the game in less than 4 hours!
description.german: Schließe das Spiel in weniger als 4 Stunden ab!
description.french: Terminer le jeu en moins de 4 heures !
description.italian: Finisci il gioco in meno di 4 ore!
description.spanish: ¡Termina el juego en menos de 4 horas!
description.schinese: 在4小时以内通关游戏
description.russian: Пройти игру меньше чем за 4 часа!

description.english: Control 80 Guardians or more simultaneously
description.french: Contrôler en même temps 80 Gardiens ou plus
description.italian: Controlla contemporaneamente 80 Guardiani o più
description.spanish: Controla 80 guardianes o más al mismo tiempo
description.schinese: 同时控制至少80个守护者

displayName.english: In the Blink of an Eye

description.english: Invoke 10 groups of Guardians in less than 2 seconds
description.german: Beschwöre 10 Gruppen von Wächtern in unter 2 Sekunden.
description.french: Invoquer 10 groupes de Gardiens en moins de 2 secondes
description.italian: Invoca 10 gruppi di Guardiani in meno di 2 secondi
description.spanish: Invoca 10 grupos de guardianes en menos de 2 segundos
description.schinese: 在2秒内召唤10组守护者
description.russian: Создать 10 групп стражей меньше чем за 2 секунды

description.english: Use one of Otto's Attacks to Finish Off Zahr
description.german: Nutze einen von Ottos Angriffen, um Zahr endgültig zu besiegen.
description.french: Achever Zahr avec une attaque d'Otto
description.italian: Finisci Zahr usando uno degli attacchi di Otto
description.spanish: Usa uno de los ataques de Otto para acabar con Zahr
description.schinese: 用奥托的攻击消灭扎尔
description.russian: Прикончить Зара одной из атак Отто

description.english: Obtain an "S" ranking for each Major Boss Fight (3 Soul Shards and Zahr)
description.german: Erhalte Rang "S" für jeden großen Bosskampf (3 Seelenkristalle und Zahr).
description.french: Obtenir un Rang S pour chaque combat de Boss (3 Prisons d'Âme et Zahr)
description.italian: Ottieni un piazzamento "S" per ogni lotta con i boss principali (3 Imprigionanima e Zahr)
description.spanish: Obtén una clasificación "S" para cada una de las peleas importantes con jefes (los 3 Cristales espirituales y Zahr)
description.schinese: 每次主要首领战（3块灵魂碎片和扎尔）都获得“S”级评价
description.russian: Получить ранг «S» за каждую битву с главным боссом (3 осколка сущности и бой с Заром)
